scripts.test:unit-vote: yarn run env:test && cross-env ENV_PATH=./.env dotenv -- yarn workspace vote test
scripts.test:unit-submit: yarn run env:test && cross-env ENV_PATH=./.env dotenv -- yarn workspace submit test
scripts.test:unit-lib: yarn run env:test && cross-env ENV_PATH=./.env dotenv -- yarn workspace lib test
scripts.test:unit-contests: yarn run env:dev && cross-env ENV_PATH=./.env dotenv -- yarn workspace contests test
scripts.test:e2e: yarn run env:test && docker compose up -d && cross-env ENV_PATH=./.env dotenv -- yarn workspace e2e test --runInBand
scripts.push-dev-db: yarn run env:dev && cross-env ENV_PATH=./.env dotenv -- yarn workspace lib push-db
scripts.patch-db: yarn run env:dev && cross-env ENV_PATH=./.env dotenv -- yarn workspace lib patch-db
scripts.start:supergraph: yarn run env:dev && cross-env ENV_PATH=./.env && dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'cd ./packages/graphql-api && make config compose run-router-local'
scripts.dev: yarn run env:dev && yarn workspace lib build && cross-env ENV_PATH=./.env dotenv -- concurrently --kill-others -p name -n router,dev-proxy,auth,spaces,contests,submit,vote,user "yarn run start:supergraph" "yarn workspace dev-proxy dev" "yarn workspace auth dev" "yarn workspace spaces dev" "yarn workspace contests dev" "yarn workspace submit dev" "yarn workspace vote dev" "yarn workspace user dev"
scripts.tweet: yarn run env:dev && cross-env ENV_PATH=./.env dotenv -- yarn workspace tweet dev
